verses.verse: Finally <S%G3063><s%> then <S%G3767><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, we beseech <S%G2065><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> exhort <S%G3870><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, that <S%G2531><s%>, as ye received <S%G3880><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> us <S%G2257><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> ye <S%G5209><s%> ought <S%G1163><s%> to walk <S%G4043><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to please <S%G700><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, even as <S%G2443><s%> ye do walk <S%G4052><s%>, â€” that ye abound more and more <S%G3123><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> ye know <S%G1492><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> charge <S%G3852><s%> we gave <S%G1325><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, even your <S%G5216><s%> sanctification <S%G38><s%>, that <S%G567><s%> ye <S%G5209><s%> abstain <S%G567><s%> from <S%G575><s%> fornication <S%G4202><s%>;

that <S%G1492><s%> each one <S%G1538><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%> know how <S%G1492><s%> to possess <S%G2932><s%> himself of his <S%G1438><s%> own vessel <S%G4632><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> sanctification <S%G38><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> honor <S%G5092><s%>,

not <S%G3361><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the passion <S%G1939><s%> of lust <S%G3806><s%>, even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2509><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>;

that <S%G3588><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> man transgress <S%G5233><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> wrong <S%G4122><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the matter <S%G4229><s%>: because <S%G1360><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> is an avenger <S%G1558><s%> in <S%G4012><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these things <S%G5130><s%>, as <S%G2531><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> we <S%G4277><s%> forewarned <S%G4277><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> testified <S%G1263><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> God2316, 2564 called <S%G2564><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> for <S%G1909><s%> uncleanness <S%G167><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> sanctification <S%G38><s%>.

Therefore <S%G5105><s%> he <S%G114><s%> that rejecteth <S%G114><s%>, rejecteth <S%G114><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> man <S%G444><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> giveth <S%G1325><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G2248><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> love <S%G5360><s%> of the brethren ye have no <S%G3756><s%> need <S%G2192><s%> that one write <S%G1125><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> yourselves <S%G846><s%> are <S%G2075><s%> taught of God <S%G2312><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> love <S%G25><s%> one another <S%G240><s%>;

for <S%G2532><s%> indeed <S%G1063><s%> ye do <S%G4160><s%> it <S%G846><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> are in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> Macedonia <S%G3109><s%>. But <S%G1161><s%> we exhort <S%G3870><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, that ye abound <S%G4052><s%> more and more <S%G3123><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> that ye study <S%G5389><s%> to be quiet <S%G2270><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to do <S%G4238><s%> your own business <S%G2398><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to work <S%G2038><s%> with <S%G2398><s%> your5216, 2398 hands <S%G5495><s%>, even as <S%G2531><s%> we charged <S%G3853><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>;

that <S%G2443><s%> ye may walk <S%G4043><s%> becomingly <S%G2156><s%> toward <S%G4314><s%> them that are <S%G3588><s%> without <S%G1854><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> may have <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of nothing <S%G3367><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> we would <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> have <S%G2309><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> ignorant <S%G50><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, concerning <S%G4012><s%> them that fall asleep <S%G2837><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> ye sorrow <S%G3076><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>, even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> the rest <S%G3062><s%>, who have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> we believe <S%G4100><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> died <S%G599><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> rose again <S%G450><s%>, even so <S%G3779><s%> them <S%G3588><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> that are fallen asleep <S%G2837><s%> in <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> will <S%G71><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> bring <S%G71><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> we say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> that are alive <S%G2198><s%>, that are left <S%G4035><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the coming <S%G3952><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, shall <S%G5348><s%> in no <S%G3361><s%> wise precede <S%G5348><s%> them that are fallen asleep <S%G3756><s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> shall descend <S%G2597><s%> from <S%G575><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, with <S%G1722><s%> a shout <S%G2752><s%>, with <S%G1722><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> of the archangel <S%G743><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the trump <S%G4536><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> shall rise <S%G450><s%> first <S%G4412><s%>;

then <S%G1899><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> that are alive <S%G2198><s%>, that are left <S%G4035><s%>, shall together <S%G260><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> them <S%G846><s%> be caught up <S%G726><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the clouds <S%G3507><s%>, to <S%G1519><s%> meet <S%G529><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the air <S%G109><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> shall we <S%G2071><s%> ever <S%G3842><s%> be <S%G2071><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>.
Wherefore <S%G5620><s%> comfort <S%G3870><s%> one another <S%G240><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> these <S%G5125><s%> words <S%G3056><s%>.
